Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: “Zvakakodzera kwandiri kuti hapana chandinotaura pamusoro paAllah kusara kwechokwadi. Zvirokwazvo, ndauya kwamuri kubva kuna Tenzi venyu nehumboo uri pachena. Naizvozvo itai kuti vana veIzirairi vaende pamwechete neni.”
(Farawo) Akati: “Kana wauya nechiratidzo, tiratidze, kana uri umwe weavo vanotaura chokwadi.”
Nokudaro Musa akakanda tsvimbo yake, uye tarirai, yakasanduka kuva nyoka iri pachena
Akaburitsa ruoko rwake, uye tarirai, rwakava ruchena (nemwenje) kune vaiona
Madzimambo kubva kuvanhu vaFarawo vakati: “Zvirokwazvo, iyi ihambura inoziva chaizvo.”
“Ari kuda kukuburitsai munyika yenyu, saka mune yambiro ipi?”
Vakati:	“Munonotse,	iye	namukoma	wake,	uye	wotumira	vashevedzeri	kumaguta kunounganidza.”
Uye, naizvozo hambura dzakauya kuna Farawo dzikati: “Zvirokwazvo, pane muripo kwatiri kana tave tinokunda?”
Vakati: “Iwe Musa! Unokanda (pekutanga), kana isu tive tinokanda pekutanga?”
(Musa) Akati: “Tangai kukanda imi.” Uye pavakakanda vakashinhira maziso evanhu vachizadza garudzo (kutya) mavari, uye vakaratidza chitsinga chikuru
Uye takave tinoti kuna Musa: “Kanda tsvimbo yako,” uye tarirai, yakamedza manyepo ose akanga aratidzwa (kuvanhu)
Ipapo chokwadi chakabva chabuda pachena, uye zvose zvavakaita zvakabva zvashaya basa
Nokudaro vakabva vakundwa ipapo uye vakabva vanyadziswa
